name: Peck Mech
description:
You are a bird in a bird mech! Race your mech through a scenic mountain landscape. In the future other challenges that will allow you to utilize your mechs weapon systems will be added.

3rd party assets:

The pilot bird: 

 https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/animals/birds/low-poly-bird-...

Sound effects: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle-15...
